categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Mar Ti Kam'Ron, nicknamed "Bucky," was a venerable male Jedi Master of the Jedi Order. Throughout his life, Kam'Ron often visited the Jedi Temple on the planet Ilum to reflect on his achievements. Kam'Ron eventually placed a memorial at his meditation site above the Temple, carving his name in Aurebesh into stone and leaving behind a wide-brimmed hat. The memorial still stood five years after the start of the Great Jedi Purge.

Mar Ti Kam'Ron was first mentioned in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order. The information regarding the Jedi Master can be collected within the in-game databank when players find and interact with Kam'Ron's memorial on Ilum. The character was named by Ilum Level Designer Nicholas G. Cameron as a tuckerization of his father, Martin "Bucky" Cameron.
